section.10: The Book of Leading the Prayer (Al-Imamah)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Al-Aswad and 'Alqamah said:"We entered upon 'Abdullah at midday and he said: 'There will be rulers who would be distracted from praying on time, so pray on time.' Then he stood up and prayed between him and I, and said: 'This is what I saw the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) do
